title: HELP ! font needed asap for wedding
content:
hello new here so hoping ive done this right.  
can anybody tell me what the font used on the picture is please? many thanks in advance!

[http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/Mr-Right-and-Mrs-Always-Right-wedding-day-chai...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017232823/http:/www.ebay.co.uk/itm/Mr-Right-and-Mrs-Always-Right-wedding-day-chair-covers-accessories-ties-sa-/281126116953?_trksid=p2047675.l2557&ssPageName=STRK%3AMEDWX%3AIT&nma=true&si=cOyXDIPwxXkpVrFrWhMkrXC2ILs%253D&orig_cvip=true&rt=nc "http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/Mr-Right-and-Mrs-Always-Right-wedding-day-chair-covers-accessories-ties-sa-/281126116953?\_trksid=p2047675.l2557&ssPageName=STRK%3AMEDWX%3AIT&nma=true&si=cOyXDIPwxXkpVrFrWhMkrXC2ILs%253D&orig\_cvip=true&rt=nc")

author: tillybud

comments.content: Looks a custom job based on [Script MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017232823/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/script-mt): custom /A and manually cut/"stenciled" (inking process purpose)
